title: Hotel Sea Crown
details: Situated on the beachfront and offering a 24-hour front desk, Hotel Sea Crown is located just 1.5 km from the famous Sugandha Beach. Free WiFi access is available.

title: Long Beach Hotel
details: Offering an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a spa and wellness centre, Long Beach Hotel is located 3.3 km from the Cox's Bazar Airport and Local Bus Station.

title: Best Western Heritage
details: Set in Cox's Bazar, Best Western Heritage offers 4-star accommodation with a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space.
